    public class UsuarioDAO
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Created by Oscar on 30/06/2017. UsuarioDAO class is the DAO class for the users. It creates new users in the database and check the already existing users.

                       LoginActivity loginActivity)

        Parameters:

        contraseña - String User password.
